thread.title: hhgregg Announces Information for Earnings Release of Second Fiscal Quarter Operating Results
thread.title_full: hhgregg Announces Information for Earnings Release of Second Fiscal Quarter Operating Results

author: admin
title: hhgregg Announces Information for Earnings Release of Second Fiscal Quarter Operating Results
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/22/2015 @ 5:38 AM   hhgregg, Inc. 
INDIANAPOLIS -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- hhgregg, Inc. (NYSE:HGG) today announced the Company will release its operating results for the second fiscal quarter ended September 30, 2015 before the market opens on Thursday, November 5, 2015. Company management will conduct a conference call to discuss the results later that same day at 9:00 a.m. (Eastern Time). Dennis May, President and Chief Executive Officer, Robert Riesbeck, Chief Financial Officer, and Lance Peterson, Director of Finance & Investor Relations, will host the call. 
Interested investors and other parties may listen to a simultaneous webcast of the conference call by logging on to the Company's investor relations page at www.hhgregg.com . The on-line replay will be available for a limited time immediately following the call. The call can also be accessed live over the phone by dialing (877) 304-8963. Callers should reference the hhgregg earnings call. 
About hhgregg 
hhgregg is an appliance, electronics and furniture retailer that is committed to providing customers with a truly differentiated purchase experience through superior customer service, knowledgeable sales associates and high quality product selections. Founded in 1955, hhgregg is a multi-regional retailer currently with 227 stores in 20 states that also offers market-leading global and local brands at value prices nationwide via hhgregg.com.
